extendedInfo.description: Over the past few years the growth rate in the markets in India has been phenomenal. With money to spend, the GenNext have become an excellent target market for numerous luxury brands. Several companies already have a good customer base but when it comes to developing the market share, very few have a well thought-out strategy in place.Advertising is important for promoting your company or brand but it is advisable to reinforce your marketing campaign with a series of advertisements. At Media Voice we work hard to put your message across to our readers in the most effective way possible. Our advertising packages include regular editorials and advertorials, which are great opportunities for the sharp visibility of your brand.Page 7 Seven brings to you:- Fashion & Entertainment- Events, launches and parties- Celebrity news- Travel & LifestyleAnd lots more...
